HomePage.title: Hello World!
HomePage.review1: It is an incredible platform that provides an engaging and accessible experience for children with motor and cognitive disabilities. Designed with inclusivity in mind, it features intuitive controls, adaptive difficulty levels, and interactive gameplay that keeps kids entertained while supporting their development.

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.placeholder: Your insights guide us in making Samga even better.

GuidelinesPage.title: Guidelines
GuidelinesPage.lead-paragraph:
Games are way more enjoyable without any glitches. To make sure your
 experience is smooth and glitch-free while learning through play, follow the
 guidelines.
GuidelinesPage.rule1:
What you
 need to
 start the
 game
GuidelinesPage.rule1-paragraph:
To dive into the
 game, all you
 need is a solid
 internet
 connection, a
 laptop, and a
 webcam.
GuidelinesPage.rule2-paragraph:
Make sure you 
 are at least 4 feet
 from the
 webcam and that
 you have sample
 space to move.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph:
When playing on a
 laptop, make sure you
  have enough battery
 power.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-parapgraph2:
Avoid bright lights in
 in the users' background.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph3:
Avoid bad lighting or
 less light in the users'
 background
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph4:
Avoid backgrounds
 with a lot of
 artwork of colours.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph5:
Play in front of a
 plain background so
 the camera detects
 you properly
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph6:
Avoid wearing clothing
 that cover your hands
 like shawls, open
 jackets.
GuidelinesPage.answer1: You can play on laptops and PCs with a webcam.
GuidelinesPage.answer2: A stable broadband connection is recommended.
GuidelinesPage.question3: Can I use an external webcam?
GuidelinesPage.answer3: Yes, as long as it provides a clear image.
GuidelinesPage.question4: Why is my movement not being detected?
GuidelinesPage.answer4: Ensure good lighting and a clear background.

Dashboard.title-p: Make sure to follow all these steps
Dashboard.step1-text: Connect your webcam and check your internet.
Dashboard.step2-text: Use a computer screen and stand 3-4 feet away.

ProductPage.clinically_text: Our platform is based on peer-reviewed research and designed with input from occupational therapists and educators to ensure your child receives the best support possible.
ProductPage.community_title: By the Community, For the Community
ProductPage.community_text: We work closely with families and professionals to continuously improve our content and ensure it remains engaging, effective, and inclusive for all children.
ProductPage.accessible_text: With gamified exercises and adaptive levels, kids can develop essential cognitive and motor skills from the comfort of their home‚Äîon any device.

ProductPage.motor_text: Motor games support children in developing essential physical coordination skills, preparing them for everyday activities like writing, buttoning shirts, or tying shoelaces.
ProductPage.cognitive_text: Cognitive games help children enhance their mental processing, attention span, and problem-solving abilities in a fun and interactive environment.

CognitiveSkills.heading: SKILLS WE DEVELOP
CognitiveSkills.subtitle: REFINEMENT OF MENTAL PROCESSES

section1.title: Samga‚Äôs Online Cognitive Games
section1.text: Online cognitive games for children with special needs are more than just entertainment‚Äîthey are a powerful tool for enhancing learning and development in an engaging and enjoyable way. From basic memory exercises to intricate puzzles, these interactive games offer children the opportunity to build key life skills, such as cognitive and motor abilities, at their own pace.

section2.title: Samga‚Äôs Interactive Cognitive Games ‚Äì A Powerful Tool for Learning
section2.text: If you're seeking interactive online cognitive games for your child, Samga's cognitive games provide a comprehensive solution. Thoughtfully designed with the needs of children with special needs in mind, these games offer more than just fun‚Äîthey provide unique learning experiences that foster skill development. Explore Samga‚Äôs diverse collection of cognitive games, discover how each game promotes growth, and find the perfect match for your child‚Äôs needs!

section3.title: Skills Samga‚Äôs Cognitive Games Help Improve in Children with Special Needs
section3.text: Samga‚Äôs cognitive games for children with special needs are specifically designed to make learning both fun and impactful, while supporting the development of vital life skills in a playful, interactive environment. Here‚Äôs how Samga‚Äôs cognitive games promote growth in crucial areas:

skill0.title: Attention and Focus
skill0.text: Samga‚Äôs cognitive games help improve children‚Äôs attention span by encouraging sustained engagement with tasks. Games that require focus and perseverance help enhance their concentration skills and the ability to stay on track.

skill1.title: Critical Thinking and Decision-Making Skills
skill1.text: Samga‚Äôs cognitive games provide valuable opportunities for sharpening cognitive skills like critical thinking and decision-making. Through entertaining challenges, children learn to manage problems independently and make decisions on the fly, which helps strengthen their cognitive abilities.

skill2.title: Motor Skills and Visual Perception
skill2.text: Samga‚Äôs cognitive games are an excellent resource for improving movement coordination and visual responses. By engaging in various game activities, children practice coordination and visual skills in a supportive and enjoyable environment.

skill3.title: Memory Enhancement
skill3.text: Effective memory skills are essential for learning, and Samga‚Äôs cognitive games aim to enhance memory in children with special needs. The interactive and fun nature of the games encourages children to retain and recall information, sharpening their memory while enjoying the process.

skill4.title: Object and Concept Recognition
skill4.text: From shapes and numbers to letters and symbols, Samga‚Äôs games help children improve their object recognition skills. The hands-on, interactive approach helps children better identify and understand objects, making learning enjoyable and effective.

CognitiveSkills.conclusion: Samga‚Äôs online cognitive games offer a modern, technology-driven approach to learning that empowers children with special needs to grow, learn, and succeed in a fun, interactive way.

MotoricSkills.heading: SKILLS WE DEVELOP
MotoricSkills.subtitle: IMPROVING COORDINATION AND MOVEMENT

section1.title: Samga‚Äôs Motor Skills Games
section1.text: Samga's online games are designed to develop and improve motor functions in children with special needs. These games target both fine and gross motor skills, helping children to strengthen coordination, balance, and physical awareness.

section2.title: Fun Meets Physical Development
section2.text: Through interactive and fun challenges, children can practice movements such as tracing shapes, dragging objects, pressing keys, or imitating motions‚Äîsupporting the development of essential motor functions in a supportive environment.

section3.title: Skills Samga‚Äôs Motor Games Help Improve:

skill0.title: Fine Motor Skills
skill0.text: Activities that involve precision using fingers and hands.

skill1.title: Gross Motor Skills
skill1.text: Larger movements involving arms, legs, and body coordination.

skill2.title: Balance and Posture
skill2.text: Games that train body awareness and control.

skill3.title: Hand-Eye Coordination
skill3.text: Challenges that combine visual cues with precise actions.

skill4.title: Reaction Time
skill4.text: Stimulus-response games to improve timing and decision-making.

MotoricSkills.conclusion: These games provide an inclusive, low-pressure, and engaging way for kids to develop confidence in their physical abilities.

BalloonPop.title: Balloon Pop
BalloonPop.subtitle: Step Into The Colorful World Of Balloon Pop!
BalloonPop.description:
Step into the colorful world of Balloon Pop! Get ready to pop as many balloons as you can before the clock runs out. But watch out for those sneaky fireballs and bombs in red ‚Äî they'll burst your balloon in no time!

With a party-time theme, this game is the perfect way to add some excitement to your daily routine. So, grab your balloon wand and let‚Äôs get popping!
BalloonPop.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Balloon Pop

motor.title: Motor Skills
motor.range: Range of Motion and Response Time

DrawIt.title: Draw It
DrawIt.subtitle: Use Your Body to Draw Letters!
DrawIt.description:
‚úçÔ∏è Welcome to **Draw It** ‚Äî a creative game where you draw letters in the air using your body!
With real-time motion tracking, you trace the shape of letters and receive feedback based on form, size, and accuracy.

Great for developing precision, balance, and creative thinking ‚Äî all while having fun writing letters in space!
DrawIt.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Draw It

FruitSlicer.title: Fruit Slicer
FruitSlicer.subtitle: Slice Fruits with Your Nose ‚Äî Seriously!
FruitSlicer.description: ü•ù Welcome to Fruit Slicer ‚Äî where you don‚Äôt need hands or swords, just your nose! üçç This hilarious and high-energy game uses computer vision to track your head movements so you can slice fruits as they fly across the screen. Tilt, nod, and ninja your way through juicy chaos!It's fun, it's fast, and it secretly boosts your balance, reaction time, and mental focus. Who knew your nose could be this powerful?
FruitSlicer.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Fruit Slicer

Tennis.title: Tennis
Tennis.subtitle: Play Tennis Using Only Your Hands!
Tennis.description: üéæ Welcome to Tennis ‚Äî a motion-controlled game where your hands become the racket! Using our advanced computer vision system, your hand movements are tracked in real-time to simulate the excitement of real tennis.Swing, react, and strategize ‚Äî while building your coordination and sharpening your mind. Whether you're training or just playing for fun, Tennis brings the court to your screen!
Tennis.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Tennis

Home.whyUs1text: Research-backed activities designed to keep kids excited.
Home.whyUs2text: Exercises scale with the child's learning curve.
Home.whyUs4text: Built with therapists, educators, and parents.
Home.review1text: This platform has been a game-changer for my son. He enjoys every session, and I've seen noticeable improvement in his coordination and attention span. The characters and challenges are delightful!
Home.review2text: So pretty much the better game. It's colorful, intuitive, and my daughter is always asking to play it again. She feels included and empowered ‚Äî and so do we as parents.
Home.review3text: The best game ever. It allows children with cognitive difficulties to interact, play, and grow. The learning curve is gentle and full of encouragement.
Home.review4text: My two-year-old daughter loves this because she thinks it‚Äôs magical. She says she 'learns everything' through games. A fun and educational tool that we now use daily.
Home.review5text: Samga is an amazing project. I‚Äôve personally seen children light up with excitement while using it. The interface is designed with care and heart.
Home.features1text: From math and literacy to science and empathy, our games spark curiosity and engage your child's intellect and emotional intelligence. Each game is designed to turn learning into an adventure ‚Äî fun, meaningful, and full of discovery.
Home.features2text: We believe in the power of movement ‚Äî not just for fitness, but for learning too. Our games get kids up and active, blending physical play with cognitive challenges that energize both body and brain.
Home.features3text: Our platform fosters meaningful interactions. Whether it's solving puzzles as a team or sharing creative ideas, kids build essential real-world skills like memory, focus, collaboration, and innovation ‚Äî all through playful exploration.
Home.features4text: Confidence grows with every small victory. Our games celebrate effort, creativity, and individuality, empowering children to take the lead, express themselves, and feel proud of what they achieve ‚Äî no matter how big or small.
Home.header_paragraph: Samga offers a gamified platform with proven exercises and materials to support children with diverse needs.
Home.card1_text: Explore playful activities that nurture learning, emotional growth, and fun at every stage.
Home.card2_text: Our games adapt to all abilities, supporting every child through joyful, accessible experiences.
Home.card3_text: Track your child‚Äôs growth with instant feedback designed for parents, educators, and therapists.
Home.card4_text: Custom solutions for schools and clinics to integrate inclusive learning with outcomes.
